attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app is so bad!! once it downloaded i opened it and it crashed my phone! when i finally powered my phone back on i noticed all of my other apps and data had been cleared and my phone reset!!!!! i don’t know what to do but don’t download this app!!! to add insult to injury the app stole my data and texted all of my contacts threatening messages that looked like they came from me! I wish i could give this 0 stars!!

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: Thought this app would make me want to vote for Trump but I hate him even more. The app kept glitching and talking about Trump2020. This app made me reason exactly why I don’t like Trump. Talking about how he wants to make America great again but continues to discriminate against minorities and lgbqt+ community. Worst app I have ever gotten. I can’t stand the amount of times this app glitched. It keep sending me out of the app, whenever I tried to get into it.

attributes.title: Genuinely bad and glitchy
attributes.review: As a trump supporter, I must give my honest opinion and that is that this app is complete trash. Every time I open the app, it force quits after 30 seconds and is just terrible over all. There is so much spam material on this app as well, I am constantly spammed with messages about “winning prizes” and about a new survey he wants me to take. The app doesn’t help at all and I just wish I never downloaded it.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app disappointed me because I thought it was going to be fun. But when I opened it, it just wasn’t great. The fact that some people support someone who doesn’t support BLM and think that people who are protesting  are “thugs” disappoints me. We need to open people’s eyes so they can see that our president is not the best person. I’m not going to bully our president or call him names but I’m just very embarrassed to live in this country. 😔

attributes.title: Our beloved president 🟠👄🟠
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app in order to spread awareness on why we need to vote in Mr Trump for another 4 years but not only did it take 3 hours to download but the software must be glitching because when u opens it up all I saw was trumps face and children in cages just glitching and when I tried closing it my entire iPad just broke down and exploded Do Not Download unless you want to buy a new whatever you used

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: Whenever I open the app, a fire starts. Yesterday I was just chilling in bed and I opened the app and my hamsters cage caught on fire and burnt my hamster to a crisp (rip hammy). Last week my window burnt down. And today was the final straw. My whole house caught on fire and the police arrested me for “arson” when it was the apps fault! My parents had to pay them $100,000 to get me out and kicked me out of their house so now I’m homeless. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS CHEETO PUFF APP!!! Thank you for your time 💅🏼✨😘

Trump is an orange. Why is an orange running for president? Oranges can’t speak. But somehow this orange has committed crimes and acts against people just trying to live their lives. Sorry, but I don’t think I want someone who could ruin my life as president again. People can legally kill me, did you know that? Yeah, in some states it’s legal to murder me and others. I hate it here, and if we want everything to get better in America, we can’t have Trump. #SettleForBiden

attributes.title: Terrible ✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus 🤢I highly recommend do not download this awful app, who ever created this should feel bad about themselves. ✨🧚‍♀️ This app also took up a lot of storage on my phone 🤡 and to sum everything up they really should get someone else to do the cover, his spray tan isn’t done right and he fr said 🟠 like I don’t feel like have to throw up every time I look at this app like 😳🔫✨don’t download ✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: App is booty
attributes.review: This app is literally the worst app ever. I can’t even get into it because it keeps glitching me out. I’m also so embarrassed to have Trump as my president that I don’t claim him, I claim the queen.🇬🇧🇬🇧🇬🇧 Obama didn’t start this many issues so why does Trump have to. I also don’t know why your trying to ban tiktok an app that is mostly populated by Gen Z can come out about any topic you can think of. After all i’ve stated I stand for Kanye 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: This app is disgusting🤮
attributes.review: I got this app to find a reason to think trump is kinda a good person but nooo he is saying all these disgusting things he is a racist homophobic person I don’t know how people support him, people need to learn that BLACK LIVES MATTER here let me say it again for the people in the back BLACK LIVES MATTER now that everyone heard me DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP let me say it again for the people in the back again DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP😁now everyone have a good ,except Donald trump
